text: Flight log entry dated March 2001. Private aircraft departed from Teterboro Airport, New Jersey. Passenger manifest includes initials only. Destination: Palm Beach International Airport, Florida.
Deposition transcript excerpt. Witness describes employment arrangement at Palm Beach residence. Position: household staff. Employment period: 1998-2002. No specific allegations in this section.
Property records show transfer of Manhattan residence. 9 East 71st Street, New York. Transaction date: 1989. Listed as personal residence. Property valued at approximately 50 million USD.
Business filing documents. Financial services company registered in U.S. Virgin Islands. Company purpose: investment management. Registration date: 1988. Principal office: St. Thomas.
Court document summary. Civil lawsuit filed in Palm Beach County. Case type: personal injury. Filed: 2008. Status: settled. Terms confidential.
FBI case summary. Investigation initiated 2005. Field office: Palm Beach. Case status: closed. Charges: solicitation. Plea agreement reached 2008.
Flight manifest data. Aircraft type: Boeing 727. Registration: N908JE. Common routes: New York, Palm Beach, Caribbean destinations. Operated 1986-2003.
Foundation records. Non-profit organization established 2000. Purpose: education and science funding. Annual grants distributed: approximately 1 million USD. Dissolved 2007.
Interview transcript summary. Subject discussed financial advisory services provided to high-net-worth clients. Period: 1990s. No allegations discussed in this segment.
Property documentation. Island property in U.S. Virgin Islands. Great St. James Island acquired 2016. Separate from main residence property.
